name: cmp-mcp-server
description: Desktop extension for managing CMP SIM/eUICC data through a local MCP server
long_description: A comprehensive MCP server that provides tools for querying and managing SIM cards and eUICC devices via the CMP (Connectivity Management Platform) API. Features include pagination support, compact response formats, and efficient token usage for AI assistants.

tools.name: query_sim_list
tools.description: Query SIM cards with cursor-based pagination and compact formatting

tools.name: query_sim_detail
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific SIM card by ICCID

tools.name: query_sim_usage
tools.description: Query SIM card data usage for a specific month

tools.name: query_euicc_list
tools.description: Query eUICC devices with cursor-based pagination and compact formatting

tools.name: euicc_profile_stats
tools.description: Get statistical overview of eUICC profile distribution
